answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Susan,
Here is a link to the Ethics Handbook for Michigan Municipalities.  It was published in 2008 by the Michigan Municipal League.  I hope this helps.
www.mml.org/pdf/ethics_handbook.pdf

answers.author: Susan Thorpe
answers.text:
The City of Peoria AZ just updated the Ethics Handbook for our employees, and we are now conducting citywide ethics training. I've attached the handbook, in case you would like to see what we use for our city staff.

author: Susan Arntz
text: Have any state associations created an Ethics Resource Guide for their members?  If so, can you post a sample?
title: Ethics Resources Guide
